name: Funk Off
description:
You're a malware defender having normally a reaaaally bad time defending against all those malicious files attacking your computer owner, very indulgent in adult movie industry...

You apparently went "full sentient mode" and decided that if you're going to do it for eternity, you need to spice things up... or make them FFFUUNKYY!

Objective

Your goal is to survive as long as possible, with difficulty increasing with each successful takedown!

There are 3 types of enemies:

Normie (adware) - quick, not so harmful to your hosts computer, but neutralizing it fast before it disappears is your best bet to get points! (10 btw)

Malicious Packet - slower, but immune to your attacks - the only two things you can do is to either dance around it or push it with your heuristic missile. If he's off the PC, you score 1 point!

Ransomware - stoods there till the end of time, harming you in the process - when it becomes full red, it damages you. Take care as fast as possible or prepare for shield-fest! 20 points for that one!

You have 2 means of defending your system:

 Shield - if you stop moving, you can take defensive stance, avoiding Ransomware attacks - it's risky though, so use carefully! Netbusters - data that can harm ransomwares and normies. Your main source of defense. It also helps repelling malicious packets!

Every 200 points scored, the difficulty rises! Watch out ;)

Controls

WASD - Controlling your antivirus

Arrows - Shooting in 4 directions

Space - Shield

Yes, you can move diagonally ;)

(Psst, if you really want the true torrent PC experience, use Numpad1 few times - just dont overdo it!)
